findings.title: PAV - Pair Address Validation
findings.description: The contract lacks address validation in the pair address argument, which can introduce security risks and potential attacks.

findings.title: EFLC - Exclude Function Logic Concern
findings.description: The contract implements an exclusion mechanism to exempt addresses from being charged fees. However, the implementation only checks if the sender `from` address is excluded from fees and not recipient `to` too.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to ensure they cannot be changed after being set, which decreases gas consumption of the corresponding transaction.
